common.providedInWebHint: We provide this service in our web platform. Open Link in Browser?

data.prepareDataFailed: Failed to refresh data due to some errors in the network fetching process.

auth.tokenStoreFailure: Failed to store token locally. Additional manual login may be need during the next start.
auth.tokenDeleteFailure: Failed to delete local token. If the problem persists, we recommend you to clear App storage in system settings to ensure account safety.

loginScreen.greetings: It's always nice to have you back.

noTransaction.pre: No transaction record found in the last

ecard.rangeHint: The data shown here ranges to the day of your most recent bill.

wpyGithub.title: WePeiyang on Github
wpyGithub.sub: WePeiyang is an open-sourced project. Help make it better by contributing to our community.

settings.timGroup: 天外天用户社区 QQ/TIM Group

helpNSupport.title: Help & Support
helpNSupport.sub: Need help? Encountered a problem? Welcome to our support forum.

settings.languageWarning: Please note that only the texts within WePeiyang App level would be changed. Text that rely on external resources like course names and book names will not be translated.

greetings.ecard: Connect your accounts. Discover more possibilities.
greetings.tju: Connect your accounts. Discover more possibilities.
greetings.lib: Connect your accounts. Discover more possibilities.

accountBinding.libPasswordHint: Your library password is the password used on lib.tju.edu.cn. If you didn't know what it is, please try initial password 666666, or the 12th-17th digits of your National ID card. Please consult the information desk in Tianjin University Library for password reset of any further information.
accountBinding.bindSuccess: Successfully bound. Additional re-login may be needed.
accountBinding.unbindSuccess: Successfully unbound. Additional re-login may be needed.

unbindModal.heading: This account is currently connected to WePeiyang.
unbindModal.content: You can unbind this account anytime. After disconnecting, you wouldn't be able to use services relating to this account.

accountBinding.unbindEcardHint: To unbind your e-card, you just need to log out. Your e-card account would be unconnected when you log in again.
accountBinding.libLatencyHint: Please note that your account binding status would be updated after the next login.
accountBinding.tjuLatencyHint: Please note that your account binding status would be updated after the next login.

info.title: About GPA
info.content: The indicators, charts and scores calculated by WePeiyang are for reference only. Please consult the Tianjin University Academic Affairs Department for official algorithms, policies and grading results.

library.renewCaveat: A single book can be renewed for only three times. We recommend that you renew your books when the due date is approaching. Proceed?

contact.noUnit: No unit found in this department
